video.name: Ginger Tahini Cookies - 1 Bowl | Vegan Richa's Everyday Kitchen Book Recipe
video.description:
1 Bowl Tahini Cookies with Candied Ginger and Gingerbread Spices. 
Get this Recipe in my book ➢ https://www.veganricha.com/vrekaz

Amazing Holiday Cookies. 1 Bowl Whole Wheat or Gluten-free Crinkle Ginger Cookies. Add Molasses or Chocolate chips for variation. Vegan Nut-free Palm oil-free Recipe.

recipeIngredient: a good pinch of cloves and nutmeg
3/4 cup or more whole wheat flour

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Add all the wet ingredients to a bowl and mix well u til smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Add all the wet ingredients to a bowl and mix well u til smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices, baking powder, soda and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices, baking powder, soda and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour, salt and candied ginger and mix in to make a smooth dough. You will need to get your hands in. If the mixture is too wet, add another tbsp flour. If the mixture is too dry, add a splash of non dairy milk.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour, salt and candied ginger and mix in to make a smooth dough. You will need to get your hands in. If the mixture is too wet, add another tbsp flour. If the mixture is too dry, add a splash of non dairy milk.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide into equal portions and shape into 1.5 inch flat discs. Press one side of the disc in granulated sugar and place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide into equal portions and shape into 1.5 inch flat discs. Press one side of the disc in granulated sugar and place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10 minutes. Cool completely and serve. For softer cookies bake 1 minute less. For crispier bake a minute or so longer. Store in a box for upto 3 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 10 minutes. Cool completely and serve. For softer cookies bake 1 minute less. For crispier bake a minute or so longer. Store in a box for upto 3 days.
